examples: engineers will work to correct the effects or air resistance

definitions.text: make amends for; pay compensation for
examples: One can never fully repair the suffering and losses of the Jews in the Third Reich
She was compensated for the loss of her arm in the accident

definitions.text: make up for shortcomings or a feeling of inferiority by exaggerating good qualities
examples: he is compensating for being a bad father
right a wrongs done to the victims of the Holocaust

definitions.text: do or give something to somebody in return
examples: Does she pay you for the work you are doing?
